widget.label: User Password
widget.tooltip: Change your existing password. Enter your existing password and a new password twice and click Save.
widget.help: You requested to change your password. Please enter your existing password and then a new password twice and click Save.

widget.label: Existing Password
widget.tooltip: Enter your existing password. This is the password you used to log in.
widget.help: Enter your existing password to verify that it really is you changing your password.

widget.label: Password
widget.tooltip: Enter a new password. Do not forget that you are expected to use a different password on each website where you create an account.
widget.help: Enter a new password that you will use with your Snap! website activities. Note that it is suggested that you never use the same password on more than one website so this password should be unique. Any character can be used in your password and it can be as long as 256 characters.

widget.label: Confirm Password
widget.tooltip: Enter your new Snap! password again to make sure you did not mistype it.
widget.help: This box requires you to re-enter your Snap! password in order to make sure you typed it properly.

widget.label: Save
widget.tooltip: Once you entered your new password twice click here to save it.
widget.help: Please enter your new password twice before clicking on the Save button. Note that afterward you can edit your account information at any time.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to your profile
widget.help: Click cancel to not change your password. Note that if you request a new password and later remembered the old password before changing it, then the system will ask you to change your password each time you log in.
